verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:6
verses.text: Or I only and Barnabas, have not we power to forbear working?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:7
verses.text: Who goeth a warfare any time at his own charges? who planteth a vineyard, and eateth not of the fruit thereof? or who feedeth a flock, and eateth not of the milk of the flock?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:8
verses.text: Say I these things as a man? or saith not the law the same also?

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 9:9
verses.text: For it is written in the law of Moses, Thou shalt not muzzle the mouth of the ox that treadeth out the corn. Doth God take care for oxen?
